row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Docker Base Url" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_BASE_URL#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Certification Path" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_CERTI_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "List Active Conainers" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_LIST_OPTION#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Show size of containers" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_CONTAINER_SIZE#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Limit" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_LIMIT#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Since" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_SINCE#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Before" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_DKR_BEFORE#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.EXECUTION :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHANGE_DIRECTORY_TO_AGENT_BIN :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RESOURCE :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.HTTP_TIMEOUT_PARAMETERS
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Building output file path :SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :SET &UC4RB_DKR_FILENAME# = "listContainers-&$RUNID#.xml" :PSET &UC4RB_DKR_LIST_CONTAINER_FILE# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#,&UC4RB_DKR_FILENAME#)
! Writing Filters to a temp file if not empty :IF &UC4RB_DKR_FILTERS# <> "" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_FILTERS_FILENAME# = "filters-&$RUNID#.xml" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_FILTER_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#,&UC4RB_DKR_FILTERS_FILENAME#)
: SET &HND# = CREATE_PROCESS(NEW) : SET &RET# = PUT_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#, &UC4RB_DKR_FILTERS#) : SET &RETCODE# = WRITE_PROCESS(&HND#,"&UC4RB_DKR_FILTER_FILE_PATH#", "&AGENT#", "&LOGIN#", OVERWRITE) : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND#
! validating if temp file has been created only then proceed otherwise abort the script : IF &RETCODE# <> 0 : STOP MSG, 50, "HEADER: Aborting this job because temp filter file has not been created! RETCODE &RETCODE#" : ENDIF : SET &FINAL_FILTERS# = &UC4RB_DKR_FILTER_FILE_PATH# :ELSE : SET &FINAL_FILTERS# = &UC4RB_DKR_FILTERS# :ENDIF
:SET &UC4RB_DKR_ACTION_NAME# = "LIST_CONTAINERS"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#, string, 12
: SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "&UC4RB_DKR_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_DKR_CONNECTION_TIMEOUT#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "&UC4RB_DKR_READ_TIMEOUT#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_DKR_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "&UC4RB_DKR_CERTI_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_DKR_LIST_OPTION#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[7] = "&UC4RB_DKR_LIMIT#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[8] = "&UC4RB_DKR_SINCE#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[9] = "&UC4RB_DKR_BEFORE#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[10] = "&FINAL_FILTERS#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[11] = "&UC4RB_DKR_CONTAINER_SIZE#" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_ARGUMENTS#[12] = "&UC4RB_DKR_LIST_CONTAINER_FILE#"
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS :PRINT 'java arguments...&UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#' ! Invoking java binary java -jar &UC4RB_DKR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_DKR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** LIST CONTAINERS ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** LIST CONTAINERS ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process:
! Publishing output file path in case of success
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :IF &STATUS# = 0 : PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_LIST_CONTAINER_FILE#,,"TOP" ! Publishing total records found into one AE variable : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_DOCKER.PUB.INCLUDE.READ_FILE UC4RB_DKR_FILE_PATH = UC4RB_DKR_LIST_CONTAINER_FILE : SET &ROOTHND# = XML_OPEN(STRING, &UC4RB_DKR_FILE_CONTENT#) : IF &ROOTHND# <> "" : SET &TEMP# = XML_GET_CHILD_COUNT(&ROOTHND#) : DEFINE &UC4RB_DKR_CONTAINER_COUNT#, unsigned : SET &UC4RB_DKR_CONTAINER_COUNT# = CONVERT(unsigned,&TEMP#) : PUBLISH &UC4RB_DKR_CONTAINER_COUNT# ,,"TOP" : ENDIF : XML_CLOSE
:ELSE : PSET &UC4RB_DKR_LIST_CONTAINER_FILE# = "" : SET &UC4RB_DKR_CONTAINER_COUNT# ="" :ENDIF
